64#include <dns/zt.h>
65
66#define CHECK(op) \
67 do { result = (op); \
68 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) goto cleanup; \
69 } while (0)
70
71#define RESSHUTDOWN(v) (((v)->attributes & DNS_VIEWATTR_RESSHUTDOWN) != 0)
72#define ADBSHUTDOWN(v) (((v)->attributes & DNS_VIEWATTR_ADBSHUTDOWN) != 0)
73#define REQSHUTDOWN(v) (((v)->attributes & DNS_VIEWATTR_REQSHUTDOWN) != 0)
74
75#define DNS_VIEW_DELONLYHASH 111
76#define DNS_VIEW_FAILCACHESIZE 1021
77
78static void resolver_shutdown(isc_task_t *task, isc_event_t *event);
79static void adb_shutdown(isc_task_t *task, isc_event_t *event);
80static void req_shutdown(isc_task_t *task, isc_event_t *event);
81
82isc_result_t
83dns_view_create(isc_mem_t *mctx, dns_rdataclass_t rdclass,
84 const char *name, dns_view_t **viewp)
85{
86 dns_view_t *view;
87 isc_result_t result;
88 char buffer[1024];
89
90 /*
91 * Create a view.
92 */
93
94 REQUIRE(name != NULL);
95 REQUIRE(viewp != NULL && *viewp == NULL);
96
97 view = isc_mem_get(mctx, sizeof(*view));
98 if (view == NULL)
99 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
100
101 view->nta_file = NULL;
102 view->mctx = NULL;
103 isc_mem_attach(mctx, &view->mctx);
104 view->name = isc_mem_strdup(mctx, name);
105 if (view->name == NULL) {
106 result = ISC_R_NOMEMORY;
107 goto cleanup_view;
108 }
109
110 result = isc_file_sanitize("nta", view->name, "nta",
111 buffer, sizeof(buffer));
112 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
113 goto cleanup_name;
114 view->nta_file = isc_mem_strdup(mctx, buffer);
115 if (view->nta_file == NULL) {
116 result = ISC_R_NOMEMORY;
117 goto cleanup_name;
118 }
119
120 isc_mutex_init(&view->lock);
121
122 view->zonetable = NULL;
123 result = dns_zt_create(mctx, rdclass, &view->zonetable);
124 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
125 UNEXPECTED_ERROR(__FILE__, __LINE__,
126 "dns_zt_create() failed: %s",
127 isc_result_totext(result));
128 result = ISC_R_UNEXPECTED;
129 goto cleanup_mutex;
130 }
131
132 view->secroots_priv = NULL;
133 view->ntatable_priv = NULL;
134 view->fwdtable = NULL;
135 result = dns_fwdtable_create(mctx, &view->fwdtable);
136 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
137 UNEXPECTED_ERROR(__FILE__, __LINE__,
138 "dns_fwdtable_create() failed: %s",
139 isc_result_totext(result));
140 result = ISC_R_UNEXPECTED;
141 goto cleanup_zt;
142 }
143
144 view->cache = NULL;
145 view->cachedb = NULL;
146 ISC_LIST_INIT(view->dlz_searched);
147 ISC_LIST_INIT(view->dlz_unsearched);
148 view->hints = NULL;
149 view->resolver = NULL;
150 view->adb = NULL;
151 view->requestmgr = NULL;
152 view->rdclass = rdclass;
153 view->frozen = false;
154 view->task = NULL;
155 isc_refcount_init(&view->references, 1);
156 view->weakrefs = 0;
157 view->attributes = (DNS_VIEWATTR_RESSHUTDOWN|DNS_VIEWATTR_ADBSHUTDOWN|
158 DNS_VIEWATTR_REQSHUTDOWN);
159 view->statickeys = NULL;
160 view->dynamickeys = NULL;
161 view->matchclients = NULL;
162 view->matchdestinations = NULL;
163 view->matchrecursiveonly = false;
164 result = dns_tsigkeyring_create(view->mctx, &view->dynamickeys);
165 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
166 goto cleanup_references;
167 view->peers = NULL;
168 view->order = NULL;
169 view->delonly = NULL;
170 view->rootdelonly = false;
171 view->rootexclude = NULL;
172 view->adbstats = NULL;
173 view->resstats = NULL;
174 view->resquerystats = NULL;
175 view->cacheshared = false;
176 ISC_LIST_INIT(view->dns64);
177 view->dns64cnt = 0;
178
179 /*
180 * Initialize configuration data with default values.
181 */
182 view->recursion = true;
183 view->qminimization = false;
184 view->qmin_strict = false;
185 view->auth_nxdomain = false; /* Was true in BIND 8 */
186 view->enablednssec = true;
187 view->enablevalidation = true;
188 view->acceptexpired = false;
189 view->use_glue_cache = false;
190 view->minimal_any = false;
191 view->minimalresponses = dns_minimal_no;
192 view->transfer_format = dns_one_answer;
193 view->cacheacl = NULL;
194 view->cacheonacl = NULL;
195 view->queryacl = NULL;
196 view->queryonacl = NULL;
197 view->recursionacl = NULL;
198 view->recursiononacl = NULL;
199 view->sortlist = NULL;
200 view->transferacl = NULL;
201 view->notifyacl = NULL;
202 view->updateacl = NULL;
203 view->upfwdacl = NULL;
204 view->denyansweracl = NULL;
205 view->nocasecompress = NULL;
206 view->msgcompression = true;
207 view->answeracl_exclude = NULL;
208 view->denyanswernames = NULL;
209 view->answernames_exclude = NULL;
210 view->rrl = NULL;
211 view->provideixfr = true;
212 view->maxcachettl = 7 * 24 * 3600;
213 view->maxncachettl = 3 * 3600;
214 view->nta_lifetime = 0;
215 view->nta_recheck = 0;
216 view->prefetch_eligible = 0;
217 view->prefetch_trigger = 0;
218 view->dstport = 53;
219 view->preferred_glue = 0;
220 view->flush = false;
221 view->dlv = NULL;
222 view->maxudp = 0;
223 view->staleanswerttl = 1;
224 view->staleanswersok = dns_stale_answer_conf;
225 view->staleanswersenable = false;
226 view->nocookieudp = 0;
227 view->padding = 0;
228 view->pad_acl = NULL;
229 view->maxbits = 0;
230 view->rpzs = NULL;
231 view->catzs = NULL;
232 dns_fixedname_init(&view->dlv_fixed);
233 view->managed_keys = NULL;
234 view->redirect = NULL;
235 view->redirectzone = NULL;
236 dns_fixedname_init(&view->redirectfixed);
237 view->requestnsid = false;
238 view->sendcookie = true;
239 view->requireservercookie = false;
240 view->synthfromdnssec = true;
241 view->trust_anchor_telemetry = true;
242 view->root_key_sentinel = true;
243 view->new_zone_dir = NULL;
244 view->new_zone_file = NULL;
245 view->new_zone_db = NULL;
246 view->new_zone_dbenv = NULL;
247 view->new_zone_mapsize = 0ULL;
248 view->new_zone_config = NULL;
249 view->cfg_destroy = NULL;
250 view->fail_ttl = 0;
251 view->failcache = NULL;
252 result = dns_badcache_init(view->mctx, DNS_VIEW_FAILCACHESIZE,
253 &view->failcache);
254 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
255 goto cleanup_dynkeys;
256 }
257 view->v6bias = 0;
258 view->dtenv = NULL;
259 view->dttypes = 0;
260
261 view->plugins = NULL;
262 view->plugins_free = NULL;
263 view->hooktable = NULL;
264 view->hooktable_free = NULL;
265
266 isc_mutex_init(&view->new_zone_lock);
267
268 result = dns_order_create(view->mctx, &view->order);
269 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
270 goto cleanup_new_zone_lock;
271 }
272
273 result = dns_peerlist_new(view->mctx, &view->peers);
274 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
275 goto cleanup_order;
276 }
277
278 result = dns_aclenv_init(view->mctx, &view->aclenv);
279 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
280 goto cleanup_peerlist;
281 }
282
283 ISC_LINK_INIT(view, link);
284 ISC_EVENT_INIT(&view->resevent, sizeof(view->resevent), 0, NULL,
285 DNS_EVENT_VIEWRESSHUTDOWN, resolver_shutdown,
286 view, NULL, NULL, NULL);
287 ISC_EVENT_INIT(&view->adbevent, sizeof(view->adbevent), 0, NULL,
288 DNS_EVENT_VIEWADBSHUTDOWN, adb_shutdown,
289 view, NULL, NULL, NULL);
290 ISC_EVENT_INIT(&view->reqevent, sizeof(view->reqevent), 0, NULL,
291 DNS_EVENT_VIEWREQSHUTDOWN, req_shutdown,
292 view, NULL, NULL, NULL);
293 view->viewlist = NULL;
294 view->magic = DNS_VIEW_MAGIC;
295
296 *viewp = view;
297
298 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
299
300 cleanup_peerlist:
301 if (view->peers != NULL) {
302 dns_peerlist_detach(&view->peers);
303 }
304
305 cleanup_order:
306 if (view->order != NULL) {
307 dns_order_detach(&view->order);
308 }
309
310 cleanup_new_zone_lock:
311 isc_mutex_destroy(&view->new_zone_lock);
312
313 dns_badcache_destroy(&view->failcache);
314
315 cleanup_dynkeys:
316 if (view->dynamickeys != NULL) {
317 dns_tsigkeyring_detach(&view->dynamickeys);
318 }
319
320 cleanup_references:
321 INSIST(isc_refcount_decrement(&view->references) > 0);
322 isc_refcount_destroy(&view->references);
323
324 if (view->fwdtable != NULL) {
325 dns_fwdtable_destroy(&view->fwdtable);
326 }
327
328 cleanup_zt:
329 if (view->zonetable != NULL) {
330 dns_zt_detach(&view->zonetable);
331 }
332
333 cleanup_mutex:
334 isc_mutex_destroy(&view->lock);
335
336 if (view->nta_file != NULL) {
337 isc_mem_free(mctx, view->nta_file);
338 }
339
340 cleanup_name:
341 isc_mem_free(mctx, view->name);
342
343 cleanup_view:
344 isc_mem_putanddetach(&view->mctx, view, sizeof(*view));
345
346 return (result);
347}
348
349static inline void
350destroy(dns_view_t *view) {
351 dns_dns64_t *dns64;
352 dns_dlzdb_t *dlzdb;
353
354 REQUIRE(!ISC_LINK_LINKED(view, link));
355 REQUIRE(isc_refcount_current(&view->references) == 0);
356 REQUIRE(view->weakrefs == 0);
357 REQUIRE(RESSHUTDOWN(view));
358 REQUIRE(ADBSHUTDOWN(view));
359 REQUIRE(REQSHUTDOWN(view));
360
361 if (view->order != NULL)
362 dns_order_detach(&view->order);
363 if (view->peers != NULL)
364 dns_peerlist_detach(&view->peers);
365
366 if (view->dynamickeys != NULL) {
367 isc_result_t result;
368 char template[PATH_MAX];
369 char keyfile[PATH_MAX];
370 FILE *fp = NULL;
371
372 result = isc_file_mktemplate(NULL, template, sizeof(template));
373 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
374 (void)isc_file_openuniqueprivate(template, &fp);
375 }
376 if (fp == NULL) {
377 dns_tsigkeyring_detach(&view->dynamickeys);
378 } else {
379 result = dns_tsigkeyring_dumpanddetach
380 (&view->dynamickeys, fp);
381 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
382 if (fclose(fp) == 0) {
383 result = isc_file_sanitize
384 (NULL, view->name, "tsigkeys",
385 keyfile, sizeof(keyfile));
386 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS)
387 result = isc_file_rename
388 (template, keyfile);
389 }
390 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
391 (void)remove(template);
392 } else {
393 (void)fclose(fp);
394 (void)remove(template);
395 }
396 }
397 }
398 if (view->statickeys != NULL)
399 dns_tsigkeyring_detach(&view->statickeys);
400 if (view->adb != NULL)
401 dns_adb_detach(&view->adb);
402 if (view->resolver != NULL)
403 dns_resolver_detach(&view->resolver);
404 dns_rrl_view_destroy(view);
405 if (view->rpzs != NULL)
406 dns_rpz_detach_rpzs(&view->rpzs);
407 if (view->catzs != NULL)
408 dns_catz_catzs_detach(&view->catzs);
409 for (dlzdb = ISC_LIST_HEAD(view->dlz_searched);
410 dlzdb != NULL;
411 dlzdb = ISC_LIST_HEAD(view->dlz_searched)) {
412 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(view->dlz_searched, dlzdb, link);
413 dns_dlzdestroy(&dlzdb);
414 }
415 for (dlzdb = ISC_LIST_HEAD(view->dlz_unsearched);
416 dlzdb != NULL;
417 dlzdb = ISC_LIST_HEAD(view->dlz_unsearched)) {
418 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(view->dlz_unsearched, dlzdb, link);
419 dns_dlzdestroy(&dlzdb);
420 }
421 if (view->requestmgr != NULL)
422 dns_requestmgr_detach(&view->requestmgr);
423 if (view->task != NULL)
424 isc_task_detach(&view->task);
425 if (view->hints != NULL)
426 dns_db_detach(&view->hints);
427 if (view->cachedb != NULL)
428 dns_db_detach(&view->cachedb);
429 if (view->cache != NULL)
430 dns_cache_detach(&view->cache);
431 if (view->nocasecompress != NULL)
432 dns_acl_detach(&view->nocasecompress);
433 if (view->matchclients != NULL)
434 dns_acl_detach(&view->matchclients);
435 if (view->matchdestinations != NULL)
436 dns_acl_detach(&view->matchdestinations);
437 if (view->cacheacl != NULL)
438 dns_acl_detach(&view->cacheacl);
439 if (view->cacheonacl != NULL)
440 dns_acl_detach(&view->cacheonacl);
441 if (view->queryacl != NULL)
442 dns_acl_detach(&view->queryacl);
443 if (view->queryonacl != NULL)
444 dns_acl_detach(&view->queryonacl);
445 if (view->recursionacl != NULL)
446 dns_acl_detach(&view->recursionacl);
447 if (view->recursiononacl != NULL)
448 dns_acl_detach(&view->recursiononacl);
449 if (view->sortlist != NULL)
450 dns_acl_detach(&view->sortlist);
451 if (view->transferacl != NULL)
452 dns_acl_detach(&view->transferacl);
453 if (view->notifyacl != NULL)
454 dns_acl_detach(&view->notifyacl);
455 if (view->updateacl != NULL)
456 dns_acl_detach(&view->updateacl);
457 if (view->upfwdacl != NULL)
458 dns_acl_detach(&view->upfwdacl);
459 if (view->denyansweracl != NULL)
460 dns_acl_detach(&view->denyansweracl);
461 if (view->pad_acl != NULL)
462 dns_acl_detach(&view->pad_acl);
463 if (view->answeracl_exclude != NULL)
464 dns_rbt_destroy(&view->answeracl_exclude);
465 if (view->denyanswernames != NULL)
466 dns_rbt_destroy(&view->denyanswernames);
467 if (view->answernames_exclude != NULL)
468 dns_rbt_destroy(&view->answernames_exclude);
469 if (view->delonly != NULL) {
470 dns_name_t *name;
471 int i;
472
473 for (i = 0; i < DNS_VIEW_DELONLYHASH; i++) {
474 name = ISC_LIST_HEAD(view->delonly[i]);
475 while (name != NULL) {
476 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(view->delonly[i], name, link);
477 dns_name_free(name, view->mctx);
478 isc_mem_put(view->mctx, name, sizeof(*name));
479 name = ISC_LIST_HEAD(view->delonly[i]);
480 }
481 }
482 isc_mem_put(view->mctx, view->delonly, sizeof(dns_namelist_t) *
483 DNS_VIEW_DELONLYHASH);
484 view->delonly = NULL;
485 }
486 if (view->rootexclude != NULL) {
487 dns_name_t *name;
488 int i;
489
490 for (i = 0; i < DNS_VIEW_DELONLYHASH; i++) {
491 name = ISC_LIST_HEAD(view->rootexclude[i]);
492 while (name != NULL) {
493 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(view->rootexclude[i],
494 name, link);
495 dns_name_free(name, view->mctx);
496 isc_mem_put(view->mctx, name, sizeof(*name));
497 name = ISC_LIST_HEAD(view->rootexclude[i]);
498 }
499 }
500 isc_mem_put(view->mctx, view->rootexclude,
501 sizeof(dns_namelist_t) * DNS_VIEW_DELONLYHASH);
502 view->rootexclude = NULL;
503 }
504 if (view->adbstats != NULL)
505 isc_stats_detach(&view->adbstats);
506 if (view->resstats != NULL)
507 isc_stats_detach(&view->resstats);
508 if (view->resquerystats != NULL)
509 dns_stats_detach(&view->resquerystats);
510 if (view->secroots_priv != NULL)
511 dns_keytable_detach(&view->secroots_priv);
512 if (view->ntatable_priv != NULL)
513 dns_ntatable_detach(&view->ntatable_priv);
514 for (dns64 = ISC_LIST_HEAD(view->dns64);
515 dns64 != NULL;
516 dns64 = ISC_LIST_HEAD(view->dns64)) {
517 dns_dns64_unlink(&view->dns64, dns64);
518 dns_dns64_destroy(&dns64);
519 }
520 if (view->managed_keys != NULL)
521 dns_zone_detach(&view->managed_keys);
522 if (view->redirect != NULL)
523 dns_zone_detach(&view->redirect);
524#ifdef HAVE_DNSTAP
525 if (view->dtenv != NULL)
526 dns_dt_detach(&view->dtenv);
527#endif /* HAVE_DNSTAP */
528 dns_view_setnewzones(view, false, NULL, NULL, 0ULL);
529 if (view->new_zone_file != NULL) {
530 isc_mem_free(view->mctx, view->new_zone_file);
531 view->new_zone_file = NULL;
532 }
533 if (view->new_zone_dir != NULL) {
534 isc_mem_free(view->mctx, view->new_zone_dir);
535 view->new_zone_dir = NULL;
536 }
537#ifdef HAVE_LMDB
538 if (view->new_zone_dbenv != NULL) {
539 mdb_env_close((MDB_env *) view->new_zone_dbenv);
540 view->new_zone_dbenv = NULL;
541 }
542 if (view->new_zone_db != NULL) {
543 isc_mem_free(view->mctx, view->new_zone_db);
544 view->new_zone_db = NULL;
545 }
546#endif /* HAVE_LMDB */
547 dns_fwdtable_destroy(&view->fwdtable);
548 dns_aclenv_destroy(&view->aclenv);
549 if (view->failcache != NULL)
550 dns_badcache_destroy(&view->failcache);
551 isc_mutex_destroy(&view->new_zone_lock);
552 isc_mutex_destroy(&view->lock);
553 isc_mem_free(view->mctx, view->nta_file);
554 isc_mem_free(view->mctx, view->name);
555 if (view->hooktable != NULL && view->hooktable_free != NULL) {
556 view->hooktable_free(view->mctx, &view->hooktable);
557 }
558 if (view->plugins != NULL && view->plugins_free != NULL) {
559 view->plugins_free(view->mctx, &view->plugins);
560 }
561 isc_mem_putanddetach(&view->mctx, view, sizeof(*view));
562}
563
564/*
565 * Return true iff 'view' may be freed.
566 * The caller must be holding the view lock.
567 */
568static bool
569all_done(dns_view_t *view) {
570
571 if (isc_refcount_current(&view->references) == 0 &&
572 view->weakrefs == 0 &&
573 RESSHUTDOWN(view) && ADBSHUTDOWN(view) && REQSHUTDOWN(view))
574 return (true);
575
576 return (false);
577}
578
579void
580dns_view_attach(dns_view_t *source, dns_view_t **targetp) {
581
582 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(source));
583 REQUIRE(targetp != NULL && *targetp == NULL);
584
585 isc_refcount_increment(&source->references);
586
587 *targetp = source;
588}
589
590static void
591view_flushanddetach(dns_view_t **viewp, bool flush) {
592 REQUIRE(viewp != NULL && DNS_VIEW_VALID(*viewp));
593 dns_view_t *view = *viewp;
594 *viewp = NULL;
595
596 if (flush) {
597 view->flush = flush;
598 }
599
600 bool done = false;
601 if (isc_refcount_decrement(&view->references) == 1) {
602 dns_zone_t *mkzone = NULL, *rdzone = NULL;
603
604 isc_refcount_destroy(&view->references);
605 LOCK(&view->lock);
606 if (!RESSHUTDOWN(view)) {
607 dns_resolver_shutdown(view->resolver);
608 }
609 if (!ADBSHUTDOWN(view)) {
610 dns_adb_shutdown(view->adb);
611 }
612 if (!REQSHUTDOWN(view)) {
613 dns_requestmgr_shutdown(view->requestmgr);
614 }
615 if (view->zonetable != NULL) {
616 if (view->flush) {
617 dns_zt_flushanddetach(&view->zonetable);
618 } else {
619 dns_zt_detach(&view->zonetable);
620 }
621 }
622 if (view->managed_keys != NULL) {
623 mkzone = view->managed_keys;
624 view->managed_keys = NULL;
625 if (view->flush) {
626 dns_zone_flush(mkzone);
627 }
628 }
629 if (view->redirect != NULL) {
630 rdzone = view->redirect;
631 view->redirect = NULL;
632 if (view->flush)
633 dns_zone_flush(rdzone);
634 }
635 if (view->catzs != NULL) {
636 dns_catz_catzs_detach(&view->catzs);
637 }
638 done = all_done(view);
639 UNLOCK(&view->lock);
640
641 /* Need to detach zones outside view lock */
642 if (mkzone != NULL) {
643 dns_zone_detach(&mkzone);
644 }
645
646 if (rdzone != NULL) {
647 dns_zone_detach(&rdzone);
648 }
649 }
650
651 *viewp = NULL;
652
653 if (done) {
654 destroy(view);
655 }
656}
657
658void
659dns_view_flushanddetach(dns_view_t **viewp) {
660 view_flushanddetach(viewp, true);
661}
662
663void
664dns_view_detach(dns_view_t **viewp) {
665 view_flushanddetach(viewp, false);
666}
667
668static isc_result_t
669dialup(dns_zone_t *zone, void *dummy) {
670 UNUSED(dummy);
671 dns_zone_dialup(zone);
672 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
673}
674
675void
676dns_view_dialup(dns_view_t *view) {
677 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
678 REQUIRE(view->zonetable != NULL);
679
680 (void)dns_zt_apply(view->zonetable, false, NULL, dialup, NULL);
681}
682
683void
684dns_view_weakattach(dns_view_t *source, dns_view_t **targetp) {
685
686 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(source));
687 REQUIRE(targetp != NULL && *targetp == NULL);
688
689 LOCK(&source->lock);
690 source->weakrefs++;
691 UNLOCK(&source->lock);
692
693 *targetp = source;
694}
695
696void
697dns_view_weakdetach(dns_view_t **viewp) {
698 dns_view_t *view;
699 bool done = false;
700
701 REQUIRE(viewp != NULL);
702 view = *viewp;
703 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
704
705 LOCK(&view->lock);
706
707 INSIST(view->weakrefs > 0);
708 view->weakrefs--;
709 done = all_done(view);
710
711 UNLOCK(&view->lock);
712
713 *viewp = NULL;
714
715 if (done)
716 destroy(view);
717}
718
719static void
720resolver_shutdown(isc_task_t *task, isc_event_t *event) {
721 dns_view_t *view = event->ev_arg;
722 bool done;
723
724 REQUIRE(event->ev_type == DNS_EVENT_VIEWRESSHUTDOWN);
725 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
726 REQUIRE(view->task == task);
727
728 UNUSED(task);
729
730 isc_event_free(&event);
731
732 LOCK(&view->lock);
733
734 view->attributes |= DNS_VIEWATTR_RESSHUTDOWN;
735 done = all_done(view);
736
737 UNLOCK(&view->lock);
738
739 if (done)
740 destroy(view);
741}
742
743static void
744adb_shutdown(isc_task_t *task, isc_event_t *event) {
745 dns_view_t *view = event->ev_arg;
746 bool done;
747
748 REQUIRE(event->ev_type == DNS_EVENT_VIEWADBSHUTDOWN);
749 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
750 REQUIRE(view->task == task);
751
752 UNUSED(task);
753
754 isc_event_free(&event);
755
756 LOCK(&view->lock);
757
758 view->attributes |= DNS_VIEWATTR_ADBSHUTDOWN;
759 done = all_done(view);
760
761 UNLOCK(&view->lock);
762
763 if (done)
764 destroy(view);
765}
766
767static void
768req_shutdown(isc_task_t *task, isc_event_t *event) {
769 dns_view_t *view = event->ev_arg;
770 bool done;
771
772 REQUIRE(event->ev_type == DNS_EVENT_VIEWREQSHUTDOWN);
773 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
774 REQUIRE(view->task == task);
775
776 UNUSED(task);
777
778 isc_event_free(&event);
779
780 LOCK(&view->lock);
781
782 view->attributes |= DNS_VIEWATTR_REQSHUTDOWN;
783 done = all_done(view);
784
785 UNLOCK(&view->lock);
786
787 if (done)
788 destroy(view);
789}
790
791isc_result_t
792dns_view_createzonetable(dns_view_t *view) {
793
794 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
795 REQUIRE(!view->frozen);
796 REQUIRE(view->zonetable == NULL);
797
798 return (dns_zt_create(view->mctx, view->rdclass, &view->zonetable));
799}
800
801isc_result_t
802dns_view_createresolver(dns_view_t *view,
803 isc_taskmgr_t *taskmgr,
804 unsigned int ntasks,
805 unsigned int ndisp,
806 isc_socketmgr_t *socketmgr,
807 isc_timermgr_t *timermgr,
808 unsigned int options,
809 dns_dispatchmgr_t *dispatchmgr,
810 dns_dispatch_t *dispatchv4,
811 dns_dispatch_t *dispatchv6)
812{
813 isc_result_t result;
814 isc_event_t *event;
815 isc_mem_t *mctx = NULL;
816
817 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
818 REQUIRE(!view->frozen);
819 REQUIRE(view->resolver == NULL);
820
821 result = isc_task_create(taskmgr, 0, &view->task);
822 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
823 return (result);
824 isc_task_setname(view->task, "view", view);
825
826 result = dns_resolver_create(view, taskmgr, ntasks, ndisp, socketmgr,
827 timermgr, options, dispatchmgr,
828 dispatchv4, dispatchv6,
829 &view->resolver);
830 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
831 isc_task_detach(&view->task);
832 return (result);
833 }
834 event = &view->resevent;
835 dns_resolver_whenshutdown(view->resolver, view->task, &event);
836 view->attributes &= ~DNS_VIEWATTR_RESSHUTDOWN;
837
838 result = isc_mem_create(0, 0, &mctx);
839 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
840 dns_resolver_shutdown(view->resolver);
841 return (result);
842 }
843
844 result = dns_adb_create(mctx, view, timermgr, taskmgr, &view->adb);
845 isc_mem_setname(mctx, "ADB", NULL);
846 isc_mem_detach(&mctx);
847 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
848 dns_resolver_shutdown(view->resolver);
849 return (result);
850 }
851 event = &view->adbevent;
852 dns_adb_whenshutdown(view->adb, view->task, &event);
853 view->attributes &= ~DNS_VIEWATTR_ADBSHUTDOWN;
854
855 result = dns_requestmgr_create(view->mctx, timermgr, socketmgr,
856 dns_resolver_taskmgr(view->resolver),
857 dns_resolver_dispatchmgr(view->resolver),
858 dispatchv4, dispatchv6,
859 &view->requestmgr);
860 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
861 dns_adb_shutdown(view->adb);
862 dns_resolver_shutdown(view->resolver);
863 return (result);
864 }
865 event = &view->reqevent;
866 dns_requestmgr_whenshutdown(view->requestmgr, view->task, &event);
867 view->attributes &= ~DNS_VIEWATTR_REQSHUTDOWN;
868
869 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
870}
871
872void
873dns_view_setcache(dns_view_t *view, dns_cache_t *cache, bool shared) {
874 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
875 REQUIRE(!view->frozen);
876
877 view->cacheshared = shared;
878 if (view->cache != NULL) {
879 dns_db_detach(&view->cachedb);
880 dns_cache_detach(&view->cache);
881 }
882 dns_cache_attach(cache, &view->cache);
883 dns_cache_attachdb(cache, &view->cachedb);
884 INSIST(DNS_DB_VALID(view->cachedb));
885}
886
887bool
888dns_view_iscacheshared(dns_view_t *view) {
889 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
890
891 return (view->cacheshared);
892}
893
894void
895dns_view_sethints(dns_view_t *view, dns_db_t *hints) {
896 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
897 REQUIRE(!view->frozen);
898 REQUIRE(view->hints == NULL);
899 REQUIRE(dns_db_iszone(hints));
900
901 dns_db_attach(hints, &view->hints);
902}

904void
905dns_view_setkeyring(dns_view_t *view, dns_tsig_keyring_t *ring) {
906 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
907 REQUIRE(ring != NULL);
908 if (view->statickeys != NULL)
909 dns_tsigkeyring_detach(&view->statickeys);
910 dns_tsigkeyring_attach(ring, &view->statickeys);
911}
912
913void
914dns_view_setdynamickeyring(dns_view_t *view, dns_tsig_keyring_t *ring) {
915 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
916 REQUIRE(ring != NULL);
917 if (view->dynamickeys != NULL)
918 dns_tsigkeyring_detach(&view->dynamickeys);
919 dns_tsigkeyring_attach(ring, &view->dynamickeys);
920}
921
922void
923dns_view_getdynamickeyring(dns_view_t *view, dns_tsig_keyring_t **ringp) {
924 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
925 REQUIRE(ringp != NULL && *ringp == NULL);
926 if (view->dynamickeys != NULL)
927 dns_tsigkeyring_attach(view->dynamickeys, ringp);
928}
929
930void
931dns_view_restorekeyring(dns_view_t *view) {
932 FILE *fp;
933 char keyfile[PATH_MAX];
934 isc_result_t result;
935
936 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
937
938 if (view->dynamickeys != NULL) {
939 result = isc_file_sanitize(NULL, view->name, "tsigkeys",
940 keyfile, sizeof(keyfile));
941 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
942 fp = fopen(keyfile, "r");
943 if (fp != NULL) {
944 dns_keyring_restore(view->dynamickeys, fp);
945 (void)fclose(fp);
946 }
947 }
948 }
949}
950
951void
952dns_view_setdstport(dns_view_t *view, in_port_t dstport) {
953 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
954 view->dstport = dstport;
955}
956
957void
958dns_view_freeze(dns_view_t *view) {
959 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
960 REQUIRE(!view->frozen);
961
962 if (view->resolver != NULL) {
963 INSIST(view->cachedb != NULL);
964 dns_resolver_freeze(view->resolver);
965 }
966 view->frozen = true;
967}
968
969void
970dns_view_thaw(dns_view_t *view) {
971 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
972 REQUIRE(view->frozen);
973
974 view->frozen = false;
975}
976
977isc_result_t
978dns_view_addzone(dns_view_t *view, dns_zone_t *zone) {
979 isc_result_t result;
980
981 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
982 REQUIRE(!view->frozen);
983 REQUIRE(view->zonetable != NULL);
984
985 result = dns_zt_mount(view->zonetable, zone);
986
987 return (result);
988}
989
990isc_result_t
991dns_view_findzone(dns_view_t *view, const dns_name_t *name,
992 dns_zone_t **zonep)
993{
994 isc_result_t result;
995
996 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
997
998 LOCK(&view->lock);
999 if (view->zonetable != NULL) {
1000 result = dns_zt_find(view->zonetable, name, 0, NULL, zonep);
1001 if (result == DNS_R_PARTIALMATCH) {
1002 dns_zone_detach(zonep);
1003 result = ISC_R_NOTFOUND;
1004 }
1005 } else
1006 result = ISC_R_NOTFOUND;
1007 UNLOCK(&view->lock);
1008
1009 return (result);
1010}
1011
1012isc_result_t
1013dns_view_find(dns_view_t *view, const dns_name_t *name, dns_rdatatype_t type,
1014 isc_stdtime_t now, unsigned int options,
1015 bool use_hints, bool use_static_stub,
1016 dns_db_t **dbp, dns_dbnode_t **nodep, dns_name_t *foundname,
1017 dns_rdataset_t *rdataset, dns_rdataset_t *sigrdataset)
1018{
1019 isc_result_t result;
1020 dns_db_t *db, *zdb;
1021 dns_dbnode_t *node, *znode;
1022 bool is_cache, is_staticstub_zone;
1023 dns_rdataset_t zrdataset, zsigrdataset;
1024 dns_zone_t *zone;
1025
1026 /*
1027 * Find an rdataset whose owner name is 'name', and whose type is
1028 * 'type'.
1029 */
1030
1031 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
1032 REQUIRE(view->frozen);
1033 REQUIRE(type != dns_rdatatype_rrsig);
1034 REQUIRE(rdataset != NULL); /* XXXBEW - remove this */
1035 REQUIRE(nodep == NULL || *nodep == NULL);
1036
1037 /*
1038 * Initialize.
1039 */
1040 dns_rdataset_init(&zrdataset);
1041 dns_rdataset_init(&zsigrdataset);
1042 zdb = NULL;
1043 znode = NULL;
1044
1045 /*
1046 * Find a database to answer the query.
1047 */
1048 db = NULL;
1049 node = NULL;
1050 is_staticstub_zone = false;
1051 zone = NULL;
1052 LOCK(&view->lock);
1053 if (view->zonetable != NULL)
1054 result = dns_zt_find(view->zonetable, name, DNS_ZTFIND_MIRROR,
1055 NULL, &zone);
1056 else
1057 result = ISC_R_NOTFOUND;
1058 UNLOCK(&view->lock);
1059 if (zone != NULL && dns_zone_gettype(zone) == dns_zone_staticstub &&
1060 !use_static_stub)
1061 result = ISC_R_NOTFOUND;
1062 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS || result == DNS_R_PARTIALMATCH) {
1063 result = dns_zone_getdb(zone, &db);
1064 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS && view->cachedb != NULL)
1065 dns_db_attach(view->cachedb, &db);
1066 else if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1067 goto cleanup;
1068 if (dns_zone_gettype(zone) == dns_zone_staticstub &&
1069 dns_name_equal(name, dns_zone_getorigin(zone))) {
1070 is_staticstub_zone = true;
1071 }
1072 } else if (result == ISC_R_NOTFOUND && view->cachedb != NULL)
1073 dns_db_attach(view->cachedb, &db);
1074 else
1075 goto cleanup;
1076
1077 is_cache = dns_db_iscache(db);
1078
1079 db_find:
1080 /*
1081 * Now look for an answer in the database.
1082 */
1083 result = dns_db_find(db, name, NULL, type, options,
1084 now, &node, foundname, rdataset, sigrdataset);
1085
1086 if (result == DNS_R_DELEGATION || result == ISC_R_NOTFOUND) {
1087 if (dns_rdataset_isassociated(rdataset))
1088 dns_rdataset_disassociate(rdataset);
1089 if (sigrdataset != NULL &&
1090 dns_rdataset_isassociated(sigrdataset))
1091 dns_rdataset_disassociate(sigrdataset);
1092 if (node != NULL)
1093 dns_db_detachnode(db, &node);
1094 if (!is_cache) {
1095 dns_db_detach(&db);
1096 if (view->cachedb != NULL && !is_staticstub_zone) {
1097 /*
1098 * Either the answer is in the cache, or we
1099 * don't know it.
1100 * Note that if the result comes from a
1101 * static-stub zone we stop the search here
1102 * (see the function description in view.h).
1103 */
1104 is_cache = true;
1105 dns_db_attach(view->cachedb, &db);
1106 goto db_find;
1107 }
1108 } else {
1109 /*
1110 * We don't have the data in the cache. If we've got
1111 * glue from the zone, use it.
1112 */
1113 if (dns_rdataset_isassociated(&zrdataset)) {
1114 dns_rdataset_clone(&zrdataset, rdataset);
1115 if (sigrdataset != NULL &&
1116 dns_rdataset_isassociated(&zsigrdataset))
1117 dns_rdataset_clone(&zsigrdataset,
1118 sigrdataset);
1119 result = DNS_R_GLUE;
1120 if (db != NULL)
1121 dns_db_detach(&db);
1122 dns_db_attach(zdb, &db);
1123 dns_db_attachnode(db, znode, &node);
1124 goto cleanup;
1125 }
1126 }
1127 /*
1128 * We don't know the answer.
1129 */
1130 result = ISC_R_NOTFOUND;
1131 } else if (result == DNS_R_GLUE) {
1132 if (view->cachedb != NULL && !is_staticstub_zone) {
1133 /*
1134 * We found an answer, but the cache may be better.
1135 * Remember what we've got and go look in the cache.
1136 */
1137 is_cache = true;
1138 dns_rdataset_clone(rdataset, &zrdataset);
1139 dns_rdataset_disassociate(rdataset);
1140 if (sigrdataset != NULL &&
1141 dns_rdataset_isassociated(sigrdataset)) {
1142 dns_rdataset_clone(sigrdataset, &zsigrdataset);
1143 dns_rdataset_disassociate(sigrdataset);
1144 }
1145 dns_db_attach(db, &zdb);
1146 dns_db_attachnode(zdb, node, &znode);
1147 dns_db_detachnode(db, &node);
1148 dns_db_detach(&db);
1149 dns_db_attach(view->cachedb, &db);
1150 goto db_find;
1151 }
1152 /*
1153 * Otherwise, the glue is the best answer.
1154 */
1155 result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
1156 }
1157
1158 if (result == ISC_R_NOTFOUND && use_hints && view->hints != NULL) {
1159 if (dns_rdataset_isassociated(rdataset))
1160 dns_rdataset_disassociate(rdataset);
1161 if (sigrdataset != NULL &&
1162 dns_rdataset_isassociated(sigrdataset))
1163 dns_rdataset_disassociate(sigrdataset);
1164 if (db != NULL) {
1165 if (node != NULL)
1166 dns_db_detachnode(db, &node);
1167 dns_db_detach(&db);
1168 }
1169 result = dns_db_find(view->hints, name, NULL, type, options,
1170 now, &node, foundname,
1171 rdataset, sigrdataset);
1172 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS || result == DNS_R_GLUE) {
1173 /*
1174 * We just used a hint. Let the resolver know it
1175 * should consider priming.
1176 */
1177 dns_resolver_prime(view->resolver);
1178 dns_db_attach(view->hints, &db);
1179 result = DNS_R_HINT;
1180 } else if (result == DNS_R_NXRRSET) {
1181 dns_db_attach(view->hints, &db);
1182 result = DNS_R_HINTNXRRSET;
1183 } else if (result == DNS_R_NXDOMAIN)
1184 result = ISC_R_NOTFOUND;
1185
1186 /*
1187 * Cleanup if non-standard hints are used.
1188 */
1189 if (db == NULL && node != NULL)
1190 dns_db_detachnode(view->hints, &node);
1191 }
1192
1193 cleanup:
1194 if (dns_rdataset_isassociated(&zrdataset)) {
1195 dns_rdataset_disassociate(&zrdataset);
1196 if (dns_rdataset_isassociated(&zsigrdataset))
1197 dns_rdataset_disassociate(&zsigrdataset);
1198 }
1199
1200 if (zdb != NULL) {
1201 if (znode != NULL)
1202 dns_db_detachnode(zdb, &znode);
1203 dns_db_detach(&zdb);
1204 }
1205
1206 if (db != NULL) {
1207 if (node != NULL) {
1208 if (nodep != NULL)
1209 *nodep = node;
1210 else
1211 dns_db_detachnode(db, &node);
1212 }
1213 if (dbp != NULL)
1214 *dbp = db;
1215 else
1216 dns_db_detach(&db);
1217 } else
1218 INSIST(node == NULL);
1219
1220 if (zone != NULL)
1221 dns_zone_detach(&zone);
1222
1223 return (result);
1224}
1225
1226isc_result_t
1227dns_view_simplefind(dns_view_t *view, const dns_name_t *name,
1228 dns_rdatatype_t type, isc_stdtime_t now,
1229 unsigned int options, bool use_hints,
1230 dns_rdataset_t *rdataset, dns_rdataset_t *sigrdataset)
1231{
1232 isc_result_t result;
1233 dns_fixedname_t foundname;
1234
1235 dns_fixedname_init(&foundname);
1236 result = dns_view_find(view, name, type, now, options, use_hints,
1237 false, NULL, NULL,
1238 dns_fixedname_name(&foundname), rdataset,
1239 sigrdataset);
1240 if (result == DNS_R_NXDOMAIN) {
1241 /*
1242 * The rdataset and sigrdataset of the relevant NSEC record
1243 * may be returned, but the caller cannot use them because
1244 * foundname is not returned by this simplified API. We
1245 * disassociate them here to prevent any misuse by the caller.
1246 */
1247 if (dns_rdataset_isassociated(rdataset))
1248 dns_rdataset_disassociate(rdataset);
1249 if (sigrdataset != NULL &&
1250 dns_rdataset_isassociated(sigrdataset))
1251 dns_rdataset_disassociate(sigrdataset);
1252 } else if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS &&
1253 result != DNS_R_GLUE &&
1254 result != DNS_R_HINT &&
1255 result != DNS_R_NCACHENXDOMAIN &&
1256 result != DNS_R_NCACHENXRRSET &&
1257 result != DNS_R_NXRRSET &&
1258 result != DNS_R_HINTNXRRSET &&
1259 result != ISC_R_NOTFOUND) {
1260 if (dns_rdataset_isassociated(rdataset))
1261 dns_rdataset_disassociate(rdataset);
1262 if (sigrdataset != NULL &&
1263 dns_rdataset_isassociated(sigrdataset))
1264 dns_rdataset_disassociate(sigrdataset);
1265 result = ISC_R_NOTFOUND;
1266 }
1267
1268 return (result);
1269}
1270
1271isc_result_t
1272dns_view_findzonecut(dns_view_t *view, const dns_name_t *name,
1273 dns_name_t *fname, dns_name_t *dcname, isc_stdtime_t now,
1274 unsigned int options, bool use_hints,
1275 bool use_cache, dns_rdataset_t *rdataset,
1276 dns_rdataset_t *sigrdataset)
1277{
1278 isc_result_t result;
1279 dns_db_t *db;
1280 bool is_cache, use_zone, try_hints;
1281 dns_zone_t *zone;
1282 dns_name_t *zfname;
1283 dns_rdataset_t zrdataset, zsigrdataset;
1284 dns_fixedname_t zfixedname;
1285 unsigned int ztoptions = DNS_ZTFIND_MIRROR;
1286
1287 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
1288 REQUIRE(view->frozen);
1289
1290 db = NULL;
1291 use_zone = false;
1292 try_hints = false;
1293 zfname = NULL;
1294
1295 /*
1296 * Initialize.
1297 */
1298 dns_fixedname_init(&zfixedname);
1299 dns_rdataset_init(&zrdataset);
1300 dns_rdataset_init(&zsigrdataset);
1301
1302 /*
1303 * Find the right database.
1304 */
1305 zone = NULL;
1306 LOCK(&view->lock);
1307 if (view->zonetable != NULL) {
1308 if ((options & DNS_DBFIND_NOEXACT) != 0)
1309 ztoptions |= DNS_ZTFIND_NOEXACT;
1310 result = dns_zt_find(view->zonetable, name, ztoptions,
1311 NULL, &zone);
1312 } else
1313 result = ISC_R_NOTFOUND;
1314 UNLOCK(&view->lock);
1315 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS || result == DNS_R_PARTIALMATCH)
1316 result = dns_zone_getdb(zone, &db);
1317 if (result == ISC_R_NOTFOUND) {
1318 /*
1319 * We're not directly authoritative for this query name, nor
1320 * is it a subdomain of any zone for which we're
1321 * authoritative.
1322 */
1323 if (use_cache && view->cachedb != NULL) {
1324 /*
1325 * We have a cache; try it.
1326 */
1327 dns_db_attach(view->cachedb, &db);
1328 } else {
1329 /*
1330 * Maybe we have hints...
1331 */
1332 try_hints = true;
1333 goto finish;
1334 }
1335 } else if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
1336 /*
1337 * Something is broken.
1338 */
1339 goto cleanup;
1340 }
1341 is_cache = dns_db_iscache(db);
1342
1343 db_find:
1344 /*
1345 * Look for the zonecut.
1346 */
1347 if (!is_cache) {
1348 result = dns_db_find(db, name, NULL, dns_rdatatype_ns, options,
1349 now, NULL, fname, rdataset, sigrdataset);
1350 if (result == DNS_R_DELEGATION)
1351 result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
1352 else if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1353 goto cleanup;
1354 if (use_cache && view->cachedb != NULL && db != view->hints) {
1355 /*
1356 * We found an answer, but the cache may be better.
1357 */
1358 zfname = dns_fixedname_name(&zfixedname);
1359 result = dns_name_copy(fname, zfname, NULL);
1360 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1361 goto cleanup;
1362 dns_rdataset_clone(rdataset, &zrdataset);
1363 dns_rdataset_disassociate(rdataset);
1364 if (sigrdataset != NULL &&
1365 dns_rdataset_isassociated(sigrdataset)) {
1366 dns_rdataset_clone(sigrdataset, &zsigrdataset);
1367 dns_rdataset_disassociate(sigrdataset);
1368 }
1369 dns_db_detach(&db);
1370 dns_db_attach(view->cachedb, &db);
1371 is_cache = true;
1372 goto db_find;
1373 }
1374 } else {
1375 result = dns_db_findzonecut(db, name, options, now, NULL,
1376 fname, dcname, rdataset,
1377 sigrdataset);
1378 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
1379 if (zfname != NULL &&
1380 (!dns_name_issubdomain(fname, zfname) ||
1381 (dns_zone_gettype(zone) == dns_zone_staticstub &&
1382 dns_name_equal(fname, zfname)))) {
1383 /*
1384 * We found a zonecut in the cache, but our
1385 * zone delegation is better.
1386 */
1387 use_zone = true;
1388 }
1389 } else if (result == ISC_R_NOTFOUND) {
1390 if (zfname != NULL) {
1391 /*
1392 * We didn't find anything in the cache, but we
1393 * have a zone delegation, so use it.
1394 */
1395 use_zone = true;
1396 } else {
1397 /*
1398 * Maybe we have hints...
1399 */
1400 try_hints = true;
1401 }
1402 } else {
1403 /*
1404 * Something bad happened.
1405 */
1406 goto cleanup;
1407 }
1408 }
1409
1410 finish:
1411 if (use_zone) {
1412 if (dns_rdataset_isassociated(rdataset)) {
1413 dns_rdataset_disassociate(rdataset);
1414 if (sigrdataset != NULL &&
1415 dns_rdataset_isassociated(sigrdataset))
1416 dns_rdataset_disassociate(sigrdataset);
1417 }
1418 result = dns_name_copy(zfname, fname, NULL);
1419 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1420 goto cleanup;
1421 if (dcname != NULL) {
1422 result = dns_name_copy(zfname, dcname, NULL);
1423 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1424 goto cleanup;
1425 }
1426 dns_rdataset_clone(&zrdataset, rdataset);
1427 if (sigrdataset != NULL &&
1428 dns_rdataset_isassociated(&zrdataset))
1429 dns_rdataset_clone(&zsigrdataset, sigrdataset);
1430 } else if (try_hints && use_hints && view->hints != NULL) {
1431 /*
1432 * We've found nothing so far, but we have hints.
1433 */
1434 result = dns_db_find(view->hints, dns_rootname, NULL,
1435 dns_rdatatype_ns, 0, now, NULL, fname,
1436 rdataset, NULL);
1437 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
1438 /*
1439 * We can't even find the hints for the root
1440 * nameservers!
1441 */
1442 if (dns_rdataset_isassociated(rdataset))
1443 dns_rdataset_disassociate(rdataset);
1444 result = ISC_R_NOTFOUND;
1445 } else if (dcname != NULL) {
1446 dns_name_copy(fname, dcname, NULL);
1447 }
1448 }
1449
1450 cleanup:
1451 if (dns_rdataset_isassociated(&zrdataset)) {
1452 dns_rdataset_disassociate(&zrdataset);
1453 if (dns_rdataset_isassociated(&zsigrdataset))
1454 dns_rdataset_disassociate(&zsigrdataset);
1455 }
1456 if (db != NULL)
1457 dns_db_detach(&db);
1458 if (zone != NULL)
1459 dns_zone_detach(&zone);
1460
1461 return (result);
1462}
1463
1464isc_result_t
1465dns_viewlist_find(dns_viewlist_t *list, const char *name,
1466 dns_rdataclass_t rdclass, dns_view_t **viewp)
1467{
1468 dns_view_t *view;
1469
1470 REQUIRE(list != NULL);
1471
1472 for (view = ISC_LIST_HEAD(*list);
1473 view != NULL;
1474 view = ISC_LIST_NEXT(view, link)) {
1475 if (strcmp(view->name, name) == 0 && view->rdclass == rdclass)
1476 break;
1477 }
1478 if (view == NULL)
1479 return (ISC_R_NOTFOUND);
1480
1481 dns_view_attach(view, viewp);
1482
1483 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
1484}
1485
1486isc_result_t
1487dns_viewlist_findzone(dns_viewlist_t *list, const dns_name_t *name,
1488 bool allclasses, dns_rdataclass_t rdclass,
1489 dns_zone_t **zonep)
1490{
1491 dns_view_t *view;
1492 isc_result_t result;
1493 dns_zone_t *zone1 = NULL, *zone2 = NULL;
1494 dns_zone_t **zp = NULL;
1495
1496 REQUIRE(list != NULL);
1497 REQUIRE(zonep != NULL && *zonep == NULL);
1498
1499 for (view = ISC_LIST_HEAD(*list);
1500 view != NULL;
1501 view = ISC_LIST_NEXT(view, link)) {
1502 if (allclasses == false && view->rdclass != rdclass)
1503 continue;
1504
1505 /*
1506 * If the zone is defined in more than one view,
1507 * treat it as not found.
1508 */
1509 zp = (zone1 == NULL) ? &zone1 : &zone2;
1510 LOCK(&view->lock);
1511 if (view->zonetable != NULL)
1512 result = dns_zt_find(view->zonetable, name, 0,
1513 NULL, zp);
1514 else
1515 result = ISC_R_NOTFOUND;
1516 UNLOCK(&view->lock);
1517 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS ||
1518 result == ISC_R_NOTFOUND ||
1519 result == DNS_R_PARTIALMATCH);
1520
1521 /* Treat a partial match as no match */
1522 if (result == DNS_R_PARTIALMATCH) {
1523 dns_zone_detach(zp);
1524 result = ISC_R_NOTFOUND;
1525 POST(result);
1526 }
1527
1528 if (zone2 != NULL) {
1529 dns_zone_detach(&zone1);
1530 dns_zone_detach(&zone2);
1531 return (ISC_R_MULTIPLE);
1532 }
1533 }
1534
1535 if (zone1 != NULL) {
1536 dns_zone_attach(zone1, zonep);
1537 dns_zone_detach(&zone1);
1538 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
1539 }
1540
1541 return (ISC_R_NOTFOUND);
1542}
1543
1544isc_result_t
1545dns_view_load(dns_view_t *view, bool stop, bool newonly) {
1546
1547 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
1548 REQUIRE(view->zonetable != NULL);
1549
1550 return (dns_zt_load(view->zonetable, stop, newonly));
1551}
1552
1553isc_result_t
1554dns_view_asyncload(dns_view_t *view, bool newonly,
1555 dns_zt_allloaded_t callback, void *arg) {
1556 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
1557 REQUIRE(view->zonetable != NULL);
1558
1559 return (dns_zt_asyncload(view->zonetable, newonly, callback, arg));
1560}
1561
1562isc_result_t
1563dns_view_gettsig(dns_view_t *view, const dns_name_t *keyname,
1564 dns_tsigkey_t **keyp)
1565{
1566 isc_result_t result;
1567 REQUIRE(keyp != NULL && *keyp == NULL);
1568
1569 result = dns_tsigkey_find(keyp, keyname, NULL,
1570 view->statickeys);
1571 if (result == ISC_R_NOTFOUND)
1572 result = dns_tsigkey_find(keyp, keyname, NULL,
1573 view->dynamickeys);
1574 return (result);
1575}
1576
1577isc_result_t
1578dns_view_getpeertsig(dns_view_t *view, const isc_netaddr_t *peeraddr,
1579 dns_tsigkey_t **keyp)
1580{
1581 isc_result_t result;
1582 dns_name_t *keyname = NULL;
1583 dns_peer_t *peer = NULL;
1584
1585 result = dns_peerlist_peerbyaddr(view->peers, peeraddr, &peer);
1586 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1587 return (result);
1588
1589 result = dns_peer_getkey(peer, &keyname);
1590 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1591 return (result);
1592
1593 result = dns_view_gettsig(view, keyname, keyp);
1594 return ((result == ISC_R_NOTFOUND) ? ISC_R_FAILURE : result);
1595}
1596
1597isc_result_t
1598dns_view_checksig(dns_view_t *view, isc_buffer_t *source, dns_message_t *msg) {
1599 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
1600 REQUIRE(source != NULL);
1601
1602 return (dns_tsig_verify(source, msg, view->statickeys,
1603 view->dynamickeys));
1604}
1605
1606isc_result_t
1607dns_view_dumpdbtostream(dns_view_t *view, FILE *fp) {
1608 isc_result_t result;
1609
1610 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
1611
1612 (void)fprintf(fp, ";\n; Cache dump of view '%s'\n;\n", view->name);
1613 result = dns_master_dumptostream(view->mctx, view->cachedb, NULL,
1614 &dns_master_style_cache,
1615 dns_masterformat_text, NULL, fp);
1616 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1617 return (result);
1618 dns_adb_dump(view->adb, fp);
1619 dns_resolver_printbadcache(view->resolver, fp);
1620 dns_badcache_print(view->failcache, "SERVFAIL cache", fp);
1621 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
1622}
1623
1624isc_result_t
1625dns_view_flushcache(dns_view_t *view, bool fixuponly) {
1626 isc_result_t result;
1627
1628 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
1629
1630 if (view->cachedb == NULL)
1631 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
1632 if (!fixuponly) {
1633 result = dns_cache_flush(view->cache);
1634 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1635 return (result);
1636 }
1637 dns_db_detach(&view->cachedb);
1638 dns_cache_attachdb(view->cache, &view->cachedb);
1639 if (view->resolver != NULL)
1640 dns_resolver_flushbadcache(view->resolver, NULL);
1641 if (view->failcache != NULL)
1642 dns_badcache_flush(view->failcache);
1643
1644 dns_adb_flush(view->adb);
1645 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
1646}
1647
1648isc_result_t
1649dns_view_flushname(dns_view_t *view, const dns_name_t *name) {
1650 return (dns_view_flushnode(view, name, false));
1651}
1652
1653isc_result_t
1654dns_view_flushnode(dns_view_t *view, const dns_name_t *name,
1655 bool tree)
1656{
1657 isc_result_t result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
1658
1659 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
1660
1661 if (tree) {
1662 if (view->adb != NULL)
1663 dns_adb_flushnames(view->adb, name);
1664 if (view->resolver != NULL)
1665 dns_resolver_flushbadnames(view->resolver, name);
1666 if (view->failcache != NULL)
1667 dns_badcache_flushtree(view->failcache, name);
1668 } else {
1669 if (view->adb != NULL)
1670 dns_adb_flushname(view->adb, name);
1671 if (view->resolver != NULL)
1672 dns_resolver_flushbadcache(view->resolver, name);
1673 if (view->failcache != NULL)
1674 dns_badcache_flushname(view->failcache, name);
1675 }
1676
1677 if (view->cache != NULL)
1678 result = dns_cache_flushnode(view->cache, name, tree);
1679
1680 return (result);
1681}
1682
1683isc_result_t
1684dns_view_adddelegationonly(dns_view_t *view, const dns_name_t *name) {
1685 isc_result_t result;
1686 dns_name_t *item;
1687 uint32_t hash;
1688
1689 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
1690
1691 if (view->delonly == NULL) {
1692 view->delonly = isc_mem_get(view->mctx,
1693 sizeof(dns_namelist_t) *
1694 DNS_VIEW_DELONLYHASH);
1695 if (view->delonly == NULL)
1696 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
1697 for (hash = 0; hash < DNS_VIEW_DELONLYHASH; hash++)
1698 ISC_LIST_INIT(view->delonly[hash]);
1699 }
1700 hash = dns_name_hash(name, false) % DNS_VIEW_DELONLYHASH;
1701 item = ISC_LIST_HEAD(view->delonly[hash]);
1702 while (item != NULL && !dns_name_equal(item, name))
1703 item = ISC_LIST_NEXT(item, link);
1704 if (item != NULL)
1705 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
1706 item = isc_mem_get(view->mctx, sizeof(*item));
1707 if (item == NULL)
1708 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
1709 dns_name_init(item, NULL);
1710 result = dns_name_dup(name, view->mctx, item);
1711 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1712 ISC_LIST_APPEND(view->delonly[hash], item, link);
1713 else
1714 isc_mem_put(view->mctx, item, sizeof(*item));
1715 return (result);
1716}
1717
1718isc_result_t
1719dns_view_excludedelegationonly(dns_view_t *view, const dns_name_t *name) {
1720 isc_result_t result;
1721 dns_name_t *item;
1722 uint32_t hash;
1723
1724 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
1725
1726 if (view->rootexclude == NULL) {
1727 view->rootexclude = isc_mem_get(view->mctx,
1728 sizeof(dns_namelist_t) *
1729 DNS_VIEW_DELONLYHASH);
1730 if (view->rootexclude == NULL)
1731 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
1732 for (hash = 0; hash < DNS_VIEW_DELONLYHASH; hash++)
1733 ISC_LIST_INIT(view->rootexclude[hash]);
1734 }
1735 hash = dns_name_hash(name, false) % DNS_VIEW_DELONLYHASH;
1736 item = ISC_LIST_HEAD(view->rootexclude[hash]);
1737 while (item != NULL && !dns_name_equal(item, name))
1738 item = ISC_LIST_NEXT(item, link);
1739 if (item != NULL)
1740 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
1741 item = isc_mem_get(view->mctx, sizeof(*item));
1742 if (item == NULL)
1743 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
1744 dns_name_init(item, NULL);
1745 result = dns_name_dup(name, view->mctx, item);
1746 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1747 ISC_LIST_APPEND(view->rootexclude[hash], item, link);
1748 else
1749 isc_mem_put(view->mctx, item, sizeof(*item));
1750 return (result);
1751}
1752
1753bool
1754dns_view_isdelegationonly(dns_view_t *view, const dns_name_t *name) {
1755 dns_name_t *item;
1756 uint32_t hash;
1757
1758 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
1759
1760 if (!view->rootdelonly && view->delonly == NULL)
1761 return (false);
1762
1763 hash = dns_name_hash(name, false) % DNS_VIEW_DELONLYHASH;
1764 if (view->rootdelonly && dns_name_countlabels(name) <= 2) {
1765 if (view->rootexclude == NULL)
1766 return (true);
1767 item = ISC_LIST_HEAD(view->rootexclude[hash]);
1768 while (item != NULL && !dns_name_equal(item, name))
1769 item = ISC_LIST_NEXT(item, link);
1770 if (item == NULL)
1771 return (true);
1772 }
1773
1774 if (view->delonly == NULL)
1775 return (false);
1776
1777 item = ISC_LIST_HEAD(view->delonly[hash]);
1778 while (item != NULL && !dns_name_equal(item, name))
1779 item = ISC_LIST_NEXT(item, link);
1780 if (item == NULL)
1781 return (false);
1782 return (true);
1783}
1784
1785void
1786dns_view_setrootdelonly(dns_view_t *view, bool value) {
1787 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
1788 view->rootdelonly = value;
1789}
1790
1791bool
1792dns_view_getrootdelonly(dns_view_t *view) {
1793 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
1794 return (view->rootdelonly);
1795}

1863 isc_taskmgr_t *taskmgr, isc_timermgr_t *timermgr)
1864{
1865 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
1866 if (view->ntatable_priv != NULL)
1867 dns_ntatable_detach(&view->ntatable_priv);
1868 return (dns_ntatable_create(view, taskmgr, timermgr,
1869 &view->ntatable_priv));
1870}

1873dns_view_getntatable(dns_view_t *view, dns_ntatable_t **ntp) {
1874 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
1875 REQUIRE(ntp != NULL && *ntp == NULL);
1876 if (view->ntatable_priv == NULL)
1877 return (ISC_R_NOTFOUND);
1878 dns_ntatable_attach(view->ntatable_priv, ntp);
1879 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
1880}

1883dns_view_initsecroots(dns_view_t *view, isc_mem_t *mctx) {
1884 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
1885 if (view->secroots_priv != NULL)
1886 dns_keytable_detach(&view->secroots_priv);
1887 return (dns_keytable_create(mctx, &view->secroots_priv));
1888}

1891dns_view_getsecroots(dns_view_t *view, dns_keytable_t **ktp) {
1892 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
1893 REQUIRE(ktp != NULL && *ktp == NULL);
1894 if (view->secroots_priv == NULL)
1895 return (ISC_R_NOTFOUND);
1896 dns_keytable_attach(view->secroots_priv, ktp);
1897 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
1898}

1900bool
1901dns_view_ntacovers(dns_view_t *view, isc_stdtime_t now,
1902 const dns_name_t *name, const dns_name_t *anchor)
1903{
1904 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
1905
1906 if (view->ntatable_priv == NULL)
1907 return (false);
1908
1909 return (dns_ntatable_covered(view->ntatable_priv, now, name, anchor));
1910}
1911
1912isc_result_t
1913dns_view_issecuredomain(dns_view_t *view, const dns_name_t *name,
1914 isc_stdtime_t now, bool checknta,
1915 bool *secure_domain)
1916{
1917 isc_result_t result;
1918 bool secure = false;
1919 dns_fixedname_t fn;
1920 dns_name_t *anchor;
1921
1922 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
1923
1924 if (view->secroots_priv == NULL)
1925 return (ISC_R_NOTFOUND);
1926
1927 anchor = dns_fixedname_initname(&fn);
1928
1929 result = dns_keytable_issecuredomain(view->secroots_priv, name,
1930 anchor, &secure);
1931 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1932 return (result);
1933
1934 if (checknta && secure && view->ntatable_priv != NULL &&
1935 dns_ntatable_covered(view->ntatable_priv, now, name, anchor))
1936 secure = false;
1937
1938 *secure_domain = secure;
1939 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
1940}
1941
1942void
1943dns_view_untrust(dns_view_t *view, const dns_name_t *keyname,
1944 dns_rdata_dnskey_t *dnskey, isc_mem_t *mctx)
1945{
1946 isc_result_t result;
1947 unsigned char data[4096];
1948 dns_rdata_t rdata = DNS_RDATA_INIT;
1949 isc_buffer_t buffer;
1950 dst_key_t *key = NULL;
1951 dns_keytable_t *sr = NULL;
1952
1953 /*
1954 * Clear the revoke bit, if set, so that the key will match what's
1955 * in secroots now.
1956 */
1957 dnskey->flags &= ~DNS_KEYFLAG_REVOKE;
1958
1959 /* Convert dnskey to DST key. */
1960 isc_buffer_init(&buffer, data, sizeof(data));
1961 dns_rdata_fromstruct(&rdata, dnskey->common.rdclass,
1962 dns_rdatatype_dnskey, dnskey, &buffer);
1963
1964 result = dns_dnssec_keyfromrdata(keyname, &rdata, mctx, &key);
1965 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1966 return;
1967
1968 result = dns_view_getsecroots(view, &sr);
1969 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
1970 result = dns_keytable_deletekeynode(sr, key);
1971
1972 /*
1973 * If key was found in secroots, then it was a
1974 * configured trust anchor, and we want to fail
1975 * secure. If there are no other configured keys,
1976 * then leave a null key so that we can't validate
1977 * anymore.
1978 */
1979
1980 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1981 dns_keytable_marksecure(sr, keyname);
1982
1983 dns_keytable_detach(&sr);
1984 }
1985
1986 dst_key_free(&key);
1987}
1988
1989/*
1990 * Create path to a directory and a filename contructed from viewname.
1991 * This is a front-end to isc_file_sanitize(), allowing backward
1992 * compatibility to older versions when a file couldn't be expected
1993 * to be in the specified directory but might be in the current working
1994 * directory instead.
1995 *
1996 * It first tests for the existence of a file <viewname>.<suffix> in
1997 * 'directory'. If the file does not exist, it checks again in the
1998 * current working directory. If it does not exist there either,
1999 * return the path inside the directory.
2000 *
2001 * Returns ISC_R_SUCCESS if a path to an existing file is found or
2002 * a new path is created; returns ISC_R_NOSPACE if the path won't
2003 * fit in 'buflen'.
2004 */
2005
2006#ifndef PATH_MAX
2007#define PATH_MAX 1024
2008#endif
2009
2010static isc_result_t
2011nz_legacy(const char *directory, const char *viewname,
2012 const char *suffix, char *buffer, size_t buflen)
2013{
2014 isc_result_t result;
2015 char newbuf[PATH_MAX];
2016
2017 result = isc_file_sanitize(directory, viewname, suffix,
2018 buffer, buflen);
2019 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2020 return (result);
2021 } else if (directory == NULL || isc_file_exists(buffer)) {
2022 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
2023 } else {
2024 /* Save buffer */
2025 strlcpy(newbuf, buffer, sizeof(newbuf));
2026 }
2027
2028 /*
2029 * It isn't in the specified directory; check CWD.
2030 */
2031 result = isc_file_sanitize(NULL, viewname, suffix, buffer, buflen);
2032 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS || isc_file_exists(buffer)) {
2033 return (result);
2034 }
2035
2036 /*
2037 * File does not exist in either 'directory' or CWD,
2038 * so use the path in 'directory'.
2039 */
2040 strlcpy(buffer, newbuf, buflen);
2041 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
2042}
2043
2044isc_result_t
2045dns_view_setnewzones(dns_view_t *view, bool allow, void *cfgctx,
2046 void (*cfg_destroy)(void **), uint64_t mapsize)
2047{
2048 isc_result_t result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
2049 char buffer[1024];
2050#ifdef HAVE_LMDB
2051 MDB_env *env = NULL;
2052 int status;
2053#endif
2054
2055#ifndef HAVE_LMDB
2056 UNUSED(mapsize);
2057#endif
2058
2059 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
2060 REQUIRE((cfgctx != NULL && cfg_destroy != NULL) || !allow);
2061
2062 if (view->new_zone_file != NULL) {
2063 isc_mem_free(view->mctx, view->new_zone_file);
2064 view->new_zone_file = NULL;
2065 }
2066
2067#ifdef HAVE_LMDB
2068 if (view->new_zone_dbenv != NULL) {
2069 mdb_env_close((MDB_env *) view->new_zone_dbenv);
2070 view->new_zone_dbenv = NULL;
2071 }
2072
2073 if (view->new_zone_db != NULL) {
2074 isc_mem_free(view->mctx, view->new_zone_db);
2075 view->new_zone_db = NULL;
2076 }
2077#endif /* HAVE_LMDB */
2078
2079 if (view->new_zone_config != NULL) {
2080 view->cfg_destroy(&view->new_zone_config);
2081 view->cfg_destroy = NULL;
2082 }
2083
2084 if (!allow) {
2085 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
2086 }
2087
2088 CHECK(nz_legacy(view->new_zone_dir, view->name, "nzf",
2089 buffer, sizeof(buffer)));
2090
2091 view->new_zone_file = isc_mem_strdup(view->mctx, buffer);
2092 if (view->new_zone_file == NULL) {
2093 CHECK(ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
2094 }
2095
2096#ifdef HAVE_LMDB
2097 CHECK(nz_legacy(view->new_zone_dir, view->name, "nzd",
2098 buffer, sizeof(buffer)));
2099
2100 view->new_zone_db = isc_mem_strdup(view->mctx, buffer);
2101 if (view->new_zone_db == NULL) {
2102 CHECK(ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
2103 }
2104
2105 status = mdb_env_create(&env);
2106 if (status != MDB_SUCCESS) {
2107 isc_log_write(dns_lctx, DNS_LOGCATEGORY_GENERAL,
2108 ISC_LOGMODULE_OTHER, ISC_LOG_ERROR,
2109 "mdb_env_create failed: %s",
2110 mdb_strerror(status));
2111 CHECK(ISC_R_FAILURE);
2112 }
2113
2114 if (mapsize != 0ULL) {
2115 status = mdb_env_set_mapsize(env, mapsize);
2116 if (status != MDB_SUCCESS) {
2117 isc_log_write(dns_lctx, DNS_LOGCATEGORY_GENERAL,
2118 ISC_LOGMODULE_OTHER, ISC_LOG_ERROR,
2119 "mdb_env_set_mapsize failed: %s",
2120 mdb_strerror(status));
2121 CHECK(ISC_R_FAILURE);
2122 }
2123 view->new_zone_mapsize = mapsize;
2124 }
2125
2126 status = mdb_env_open(env, view->new_zone_db, DNS_LMDB_FLAGS, 0600);
2127 if (status != MDB_SUCCESS) {
2128 isc_log_write(dns_lctx, DNS_LOGCATEGORY_GENERAL,
2129 ISC_LOGMODULE_OTHER, ISC_LOG_ERROR,
2130 "mdb_env_open of '%s' failed: %s",
2131 view->new_zone_db, mdb_strerror(status));
2132 CHECK(ISC_R_FAILURE);
2133 }
2134
2135 view->new_zone_dbenv = env;
2136 env = NULL;
2137#endif /* HAVE_LMDB */
2138
2139 view->new_zone_config = cfgctx;
2140 view->cfg_destroy = cfg_destroy;
2141
2142 cleanup:
2143 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2144 if (view->new_zone_file != NULL) {
2145 isc_mem_free(view->mctx, view->new_zone_file);
2146 view->new_zone_file = NULL;
2147 }
2148
2149#ifdef HAVE_LMDB
2150 if (view->new_zone_db != NULL) {
2151 isc_mem_free(view->mctx, view->new_zone_db);
2152 view->new_zone_db = NULL;
2153 }
2154 if (env != NULL) {
2155 mdb_env_close(env);
2156 }
2157#endif /* HAVE_LMDB */
2158 view->new_zone_config = NULL;
2159 view->cfg_destroy = NULL;
2160 }
2161
2162 return (result);
2163}
2164
2165void
2166dns_view_setnewzonedir(dns_view_t *view, const char *dir) {
2167 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
2168
2169 if (view->new_zone_dir != NULL) {
2170 isc_mem_free(view->mctx, view->new_zone_dir);
2171 view->new_zone_dir = NULL;
2172 }
2173
2174 if (dir == NULL) {
2175 return;
2176 }
2177
2178 view->new_zone_dir = isc_mem_strdup(view->mctx, dir);
2179}
2180
2181const char *
2182dns_view_getnewzonedir(dns_view_t *view) {
2183 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
2184
2185 return (view->new_zone_dir);
2186}
2187
2188isc_result_t
2189dns_view_searchdlz(dns_view_t *view, const dns_name_t *name,
2190 unsigned int minlabels, dns_clientinfomethods_t *methods,
2191 dns_clientinfo_t *clientinfo, dns_db_t **dbp)
2192{
2193 dns_fixedname_t fname;
2194 dns_name_t *zonename;
2195 unsigned int namelabels;
2196 unsigned int i;
2197 isc_result_t result;
2198 dns_dlzfindzone_t findzone;
2199 dns_dlzdb_t *dlzdb;
2200 dns_db_t *db, *best = NULL;
2201
2202 /*
2203 * Performs checks to make sure data is as we expect it to be.
2204 */
2205 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
2206 REQUIRE(name != NULL);
2207 REQUIRE(dbp != NULL && *dbp == NULL);
2208
2209 /* setup a "fixed" dns name */
2210 zonename = dns_fixedname_initname(&fname);
2211
2212 /* count the number of labels in the name */
2213 namelabels = dns_name_countlabels(name);
2214
2215 for (dlzdb = ISC_LIST_HEAD(view->dlz_searched);
2216 dlzdb != NULL;
2217 dlzdb = ISC_LIST_NEXT(dlzdb, link))
2218 {
2219 REQUIRE(DNS_DLZ_VALID(dlzdb));
2220
2221 /*
2222 * loop through starting with the longest domain name and
2223 * trying shorter names portions of the name until we find a
2224 * match, have an error, or are below the 'minlabels'
2225 * threshold. minlabels is 0, if neither the standard
2226 * database nor any previous DLZ database had a zone name
2227 * match. Otherwise minlabels is the number of labels
2228 * in that name. We need to beat that for a "better"
2229 * match for this DLZ database to be authoritative.
2230 */
2231 for (i = namelabels; i > minlabels && i > 1; i--) {
2232 if (i == namelabels) {
2233 result = dns_name_copy(name, zonename, NULL);
2234 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
2235 return (result);
2236 } else
2237 dns_name_split(name, i, NULL, zonename);
2238
2239 /* ask SDLZ driver if the zone is supported */
2240 db = NULL;
2241 findzone = dlzdb->implementation->methods->findzone;
2242 result = (*findzone)(dlzdb->implementation->driverarg,
2243 dlzdb->dbdata, dlzdb->mctx,
2244 view->rdclass, zonename,
2245 methods, clientinfo, &db);
2246
2247 if (result != ISC_R_NOTFOUND) {
2248 if (best != NULL)
2249 dns_db_detach(&best);
2250 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2251 INSIST(db != NULL);
2252 dns_db_attach(db, &best);
2253 dns_db_detach(&db);
2254 minlabels = i;
2255 } else {
2256 if (db != NULL)
2257 dns_db_detach(&db);
2258 break;
2259 }
2260 } else if (db != NULL)
2261 dns_db_detach(&db);
2262 }
2263 }
2264
2265 if (best != NULL) {
2266 dns_db_attach(best, dbp);
2267 dns_db_detach(&best);
2268 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
2269 }
2270
2271 return (ISC_R_NOTFOUND);
2272}
2273
2274uint32_t
2275dns_view_getfailttl(dns_view_t *view) {
2276 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
2277 return (view->fail_ttl);
2278}
2279
2280void
2281dns_view_setfailttl(dns_view_t *view, uint32_t fail_ttl) {
2282 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
2283 view->fail_ttl = fail_ttl;
2284}

2286isc_result_t
2287dns_view_saventa(dns_view_t *view) {
2288 isc_result_t result;
2289 bool removefile = false;
2290 dns_ntatable_t *ntatable = NULL;
2291 FILE *fp = NULL;
2292
2293 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
2294
2295 if (view->nta_lifetime == 0)
2296 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
2297
2298 /* Open NTA save file for overwrite. */
2299 CHECK(isc_stdio_open(view->nta_file, "w", &fp));
2300
2301 result = dns_view_getntatable(view, &ntatable);
2302 if (result == ISC_R_NOTFOUND) {
2303 removefile = true;
2304 result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
2305 goto cleanup;
2306 } else
2307 CHECK(result);
2308
2309 result = dns_ntatable_save(ntatable, fp);
2310 if (result == ISC_R_NOTFOUND) {
2311 removefile = true;
2312 result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
2313 } else if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2314 result = isc_stdio_close(fp);
2315 fp = NULL;
2316 }
2317
2318 cleanup:
2319 if (ntatable != NULL)
2320 dns_ntatable_detach(&ntatable);
2321
2322 if (fp != NULL)
2323 (void)isc_stdio_close(fp);
2324
2325 /* Don't leave half-baked NTA save files lying around. */
2326 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS || removefile)
2327 (void) isc_file_remove(view->nta_file);
2328
2329 return (result);
2330}
2331
2332#define TSTR(t) ((t).value.as_textregion.base)
2333#define TLEN(t) ((t).value.as_textregion.length)
2334
2335isc_result_t
2336dns_view_loadnta(dns_view_t *view) {
2337 isc_result_t result;
2338 dns_ntatable_t *ntatable = NULL;
2339 isc_lex_t *lex = NULL;
2340 isc_token_t token;
2341 isc_stdtime_t now;
2342
2343 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
2344
2345 if (view->nta_lifetime == 0)
2346 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
2347
2348 CHECK(isc_lex_create(view->mctx, 1025, &lex));
2349 CHECK(isc_lex_openfile(lex, view->nta_file));
2350 CHECK(dns_view_getntatable(view, &ntatable));
2351 isc_stdtime_get(&now);
2352
2353 for (;;) {
2354 int options = (ISC_LEXOPT_EOL | ISC_LEXOPT_EOF);
2355 char *name, *type, *timestamp;
2356 size_t len;
2357 dns_fixedname_t fn;
2358 const dns_name_t *ntaname;
2359 isc_buffer_t b;
2360 isc_stdtime_t t;
2361 bool forced;
2362
2363 CHECK(isc_lex_gettoken(lex, options, &token));
2364 if (token.type == isc_tokentype_eof)
2365 break;
2366 else if (token.type != isc_tokentype_string)
2367 CHECK(ISC_R_UNEXPECTEDTOKEN);
2368 name = TSTR(token);
2369 len = TLEN(token);
2370
2371 if (strcmp(name, ".") == 0)
2372 ntaname = dns_rootname;
2373 else {
2374 dns_name_t *fname;
2375 fname = dns_fixedname_initname(&fn);
2376
2377 isc_buffer_init(&b, name, (unsigned int)len);
2378 isc_buffer_add(&b, (unsigned int)len);
2379 CHECK(dns_name_fromtext(fname, &b, dns_rootname,
2380 0, NULL));
2381 ntaname = fname;
2382 }
2383
2384 CHECK(isc_lex_gettoken(lex, options, &token));
2385 if (token.type != isc_tokentype_string)
2386 CHECK(ISC_R_UNEXPECTEDTOKEN);
2387 type = TSTR(token);
2388
2389 if (strcmp(type, "regular") == 0)
2390 forced = false;
2391 else if (strcmp(type, "forced") == 0)
2392 forced = true;
2393 else
2394 CHECK(ISC_R_UNEXPECTEDTOKEN);
2395
2396 CHECK(isc_lex_gettoken(lex, options, &token));
2397 if (token.type != isc_tokentype_string)
2398 CHECK(ISC_R_UNEXPECTEDTOKEN);
2399 timestamp = TSTR(token);
2400 CHECK(dns_time32_fromtext(timestamp, &t));
2401
2402 CHECK(isc_lex_gettoken(lex, options, &token));
2403 if (token.type != isc_tokentype_eol &&
2404 token.type != isc_tokentype_eof)
2405 CHECK(ISC_R_UNEXPECTEDTOKEN);
2406
2407 if (now <= t) {
2408 if (t > (now + 604800))
2409 t = now + 604800;
2410
2411 (void) dns_ntatable_add(ntatable, ntaname,
2412 forced, 0, t);
2413 } else {
2414 char nb[DNS_NAME_FORMATSIZE];
2415 dns_name_format(ntaname, nb, sizeof(nb));
2416 isc_log_write(dns_lctx, DNS_LOGCATEGORY_DNSSEC,
2417 DNS_LOGMODULE_NTA, ISC_LOG_INFO,
2418 "ignoring expired NTA at %s", nb);
2419 }
2420 };
2421
2422 cleanup:
2423 if (ntatable != NULL)
2424 dns_ntatable_detach(&ntatable);
2425
2426 if (lex != NULL) {
2427 isc_lex_close(lex);
2428 isc_lex_destroy(&lex);
2429 }
2430
2431 return (result);
2432}
2433
2434void
2435dns_view_setviewcommit(dns_view_t *view) {
2436 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
2437
2438 LOCK(&view->lock);
2439
2440 if (view->redirect != NULL) {
2441 dns_zone_setviewcommit(view->redirect);
2442 }
2443 if (view->managed_keys != NULL) {
2444 dns_zone_setviewcommit(view->managed_keys);
2445 }
2446 if (view->zonetable != NULL) {
2447 dns_zt_setviewcommit(view->zonetable);
2448 }
2449
2450 UNLOCK(&view->lock);
2451}
2452
2453void
2454dns_view_setviewrevert(dns_view_t *view) {
2455 dns_zt_t *zonetable;
2456
2457 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
2458
2459 /*
2460 * dns_zt_setviewrevert() attempts to lock this view, so we must
2461 * release the lock.
2462 */
2463 LOCK(&view->lock);
2464 if (view->redirect != NULL) {
2465 dns_zone_setviewrevert(view->redirect);
2466 }
2467 if (view->managed_keys != NULL) {
2468 dns_zone_setviewrevert(view->managed_keys);
2469 }
2470 zonetable = view->zonetable;
2471 UNLOCK(&view->lock);
2472
2473 if (zonetable != NULL) {
2474 dns_zt_setviewrevert(zonetable);
2475 }
2476}
